password_reset.subject: Badilisha nenosiri lako
password_reset.body: Bofya link hii kubadilisha nenosiri lako: {{resetUrl}}. Link inaisha baada ya dakika 15.

email_verify.subject: Thibitisha barua pepe yako
email_verify.body: Msimbo wako wa uthibitisho wa DijitoTrack ni {{code}}. Unaisha baada ya dakika 15.

otp.message: Msimbo wako wa uthibitisho wa DijitoTrack ni {{otp}}. Unaisha baada ya dakika 5.

business_invite.subject: Umealikwa kujiunga na biashara
business_invite.body: Umealikwa kujiunga na biashara kama {{role}}. Tafadhali bofya link hii kukamilisha usajili wako: {{inviteUrl}}

due.title: Malipo leo
due.body: Habari {{name}}, malipo yako ya {{amount}} yanahitajika leo.

business.grace: Biashara imehamishwa kwenye kipindi cha msamaha
business.inactive: Akaunti ya biashara yako haifanyi kazi. Tafadhali sasisha usajili wako.
business.codeGenerationFailed: Imeshindikana kutengeneza namba ya kipekee ya biashara

customer.welcome_sms: Karibu {{business}}. Business code yako ni {{code}}. Tumia hii kukamilisha access ya DijitoTrack.
customer.inactiveBlacklisted: Akaunti ya mteja huyu haijawashwa au amewekwa kwenye orodha ya marufuku, hivyo hawezi kufanya miamala yoyote. Tafadhali washa mteja kwanza.
customer.inactive: Akaunti yako imesitishwa. Tafadhali wasiliana na biashara.
customer.unauthorized: Huna ruhusa ya kufikia taarifa zako

contract.terminated: Mkataba huu umesitishwa na hauwezi kupokea malipo
contract.invalid-downpayment: Malipo ya awali hayawezi kuzidi thamani ya mkataba
contract.custom-days-required: Idadi ya siku inahitajika kwa malipo ya desturi
contract.balance-not-zero: Salio la mkataba lazima liwe sifuri ili ukamilike

payment.initiated: Malipo ya usajili yameanzishwa kwa mafanikio.
payment.confirmed: Malipo ya usajili yamethibitishwa kwa mafanikio.
payment.pending_exists: Tayari kuna malipo yanayosubiri kwa usajili huu.
payment.list_success: Orodha ya malipo imepatikana kwa mafanikio.
payment.no_external_reference: Malipo hayana kumbukumbu ya muamala wa nje.
payment.invalid_state: Malipo hayako katika hali inayoruhusiwa kwa operesheni hii.
payment.invalid_amount: Kiasi cha malipo hakilingani na kinachotarajiwa.
payment.invalid_payload: Taarifa za malipo zilizopokelewa si sahihi.
payment.webhook_expired: Ombi la webhook limepitwa na muda.
payment.provider_missing: Kichwa cha mtoa huduma ya malipo hakipo.
payment.provider_down: Mtoa huduma wa malipo hayupo kwa sasa. Tafadhali jaribu tena baadaye.
payment.selcom_unreachable: Huduma ya Selcom haipatikani kwa sasa.
payment.mpesa_unreachable: Huduma ya Mpesa haipatikani kwa sasa.
payment.airtel_unreachable: Huduma ya Airtel haipatikani kwa sasa.

approval.already_pending: Tayari kuna ombi la idhini linalosubiri kwa hatua hii

dashboard.insights_loaded: Taarifa za akili ya dashibodi zimepatikana
